title: Amari Cooper trade reaction & MJD gives a Le'Veon Bell update
itunes:title: Amari Cooper trade reaction & MJD gives a Le'Veon Bell update
description:
Dave Dameshek first sits on his magic carpet with Maurice Jones-Drew who kibitzes about the breaking news that Eli Apple was traded to the Saints (6:00), meaning the Shek's Steelers still have a shot at getting Patrick Peterson. Plus, Maurice gives an update on the Le'Veon Bell holdout situation (11:45) and who his Super Bowl picks are (22:20). Next, Shek is back in Studio 66 with David Carr who gives his instant reaction about hearing the Amari Cooper trade news (28:12). David also talks about if his brother, Derek, is next to be traded and if the Giants could be the destination (32:28)?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
